legal_basis: s. 78 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
application_details: Hasan had three degrees, with over 18 years of full-time study
decision_reasoning: points are awarded based on the single educational credential yielding the highest points
result_of_case: matter referred back for redetermination by a different visa officer
procedure_followed: Judicial review before the Federal Court
certification of a question for the Federal Court of Appeal
conclusion_outcome: Federal Court allowed Hasan's judicial review
